game.name: Super Meat Boy Race Mode
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You know how you have that one annoying friend who would always be like "I'm so much better at Super Meat Boy than you" and "If we could race I would destroy you!" well guess what, get some potato chips, grab some controllers, and reluctantly call that friend over so you can shove his undeserving fe
